body:
That was merged already, a year ago.

(That change you linked to is in the x/sys subrepo: golang.org/x/sys/unix)

If you're talking about the syscall package in the standard library, it has been frozen for the past few releases. See https://golang.org/s/go1.4-syscall, which is also noted at the top of https://golang.org/pkg/syscall/#pkg-overview
